Text:
I'm happy to see how much attention this torrent is getting so quickly :D
Please seed when you're done downloading. I do have a 5Mbps upload but there are a lot of leechers.
Some episodes have problems - Web Weirdos is a bit glitchy but watchable, and Goliad is incomplete (last few minutes are missing/corrupt). Most of them work OK.
That's odd.... I'll see what I can do to fix that and create a new torrent.

If you could please list the episodes that you're having problems with, I'd be happy to fix them and upload a new torrent. If you don't list the episodes, I'll do my best to find them myself and re-upload.

I'm in the process of downloading all of season 4 in 720p from a CRON release. It's full HD the contents of the release (NFO) can be found here: https://binsearch.info/viewNFO.php?oid=89923117 I will be re-uploading the torrent shortly.
It seems my source had corruption. There are now complete versions of this season in other torrents on TPB. Use those instead. Sorry for the inconvenience.
Just to clarify: this torrent works fine. Everything is entirely watchable, there are only a few episodes that skip, and one episode (the Goliad episode) that cuts out early.
